p: All patients stated that their family members were their spiritual pillars during their hospital stay. P1: "Every day I am happiest when I have video communication with my family. They care about me and encourage me every day." The support of relatives, friends, and prevention and control personnel from the government at all levels was also very important. P3: "Friends are concerned about my health, government staff are also concerned about me, and I feel that the country attaches great importance to us." Most patients believed that adequate social support was a key factor in their own fight against the epidemic. P8: "With the encouragement of my family, my mood gradually stabilized, which makes me very powerful."
